sentences.en: A stringed instrument of a long, fretted fingerboard with resonating gourds at each end.
sentences.cn: 与木琴相似但是含有金属棒和在共鸣器中的旋转盘的打击乐器.

sentences.en: Ebony fingerboard, both jujube wood and ebony sets can be supplied; rosewood end pin, metal tailpiece.
sentences.cn: 乌木指板, 枣木配件和乌木配件两种, 红木尾柱, 金属拉线板.

sentences.en: I'm just doing it with a series of switches instead of a fingerboard, which we obviously don't have-- Okay. That's fine. That's great.
sentences.cn: 只是我用的是阀键,代替圆号上很明显没有的指板,好的,很棒

sentences.en: When you dress your fingerboard, do you take a little relief out of your bass side?
sentences.cn: 但我还不知道怎样把吉他做到像你一样.

trans.tran_cn: （钢琴，风琴的）键盘，（提琴的）指板，指路牌，尖形指示牌
